"Mining Rig Defense":
"\"Mining Rig Defense\" is an Emergency Quest in which you protect Resource Mining Rigs from enemy attack.

Enemies come intermittently in \"Waves\". Your objective is to protect the Rigs long enough to survive the final Wave."

"During battle, special Photon crystals called \"Collect Signs\" will appear in the field. When collected, they award \"Merit Points\", which you can use to access support functions of Mining Rigs and Delivery Devices.

"If you collect enough Collect Signs and access a Mining Rig, you will be able to use the \"Durability Recovery\" and \"Barrier Shield\" support functions.

\"Mobile Cannons\" are powerful special weapons that can be summoned from Delivery Devices. While equipped with one, you cannot access your normal weapons and gain a special dedicated moveset instead."
